description:
Conan, Ran, and Sonoko visit the hotel room where Sera is living. In the hallway on the 30th floor of Sera`s hotel, editors A, B, and C wait for author Hiura Keigo to finish his manuscripts. Later, Hiura`s assistant Minazuki Chiori is found murdered in the room directly below Hiura`s.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Igai na Kekka no Ren`ai Shousetsu (Zenpen)
The Romance Novel with the Unexpected Conclusion (Part 1)
النتيجة غير المُتوقعة للرواية الرُّمَنسية (الجزء الأول)
意外な結果の恋愛小説 (前編)
